channel.title: EternalBlue on Chapl1n
channel.description: Recent content in EternalBlue on Chapl1n

item.title: Blue HackTheBox - Write-Up
item.description: This blog piece details my approach for pwning the HackTheBox machine called Blue. As per usual for my HackTheBox writeups, I will try to pwn Blue with and without Metasploit.

item.title: Legacy HackTheBox - Write-Up
item.description: The HackTheBox machine Legacy represents the start of my journey into the field of ethical hacking. As I progress through these pieces I will explain my approach through each of the phases of a pen test.
